Target_Challenge.Description:
Goad target enemy into a duel to the death over 3 turns:
- You and your target receive bonus damage based on the opposite's Vitality, up to 50% damage at 100% Vitality.
- If either of you die before Challenged expires, the other wins, is restored [1], and receives +[2]% damage, [3] and [4] for 2 turns.
- If you perform an attack or skill during your turn that does not hit this target in some way, nor repositions you closer to this target, or the challenge expires, you lose and suffer [5].

Source Infusions:
1: Apply Hasted to yourself for 2 turns.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Cast Battle Stomp at your target. Apply Deflecting to yourself for 3 turns. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Pay 2 more AP: Also mirror these effects for your target: at the start of each of your turns while Challenge is active, apply Disintegrating: Physical 20% (+2% per Warfare) to the opposing challenge target until the end of your turn. Disintegrating causes the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) as Physical when it expires.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Shout_AMER_Adaptation.Description:
Your armor shifts and adapts to cover your weaknesses; activate Adaptation.
Convert up to 15% of your maximum Physical or Magic Armor to the opposite armor, until their current values equilibrate or reach their maximum; loss occurs from the higher of the two values and restoration occurs to the lower of the two values.
Adaptation is a power that can be augmented through the Ascension feature.

Shout_AMER_Enrage.Description:
Apply Berserk to yourself for 3 turns; while wielding a melee weapon during your turn:
- Gain +50% Critical Chance during Warfare skill casts.
- Critical Hits during Warfare skill casts will have their damage multiplicatively increased by 50%.
- The first Critical Hit during Warfare skill casts will take away 25% of your total Vitality.
- Basic attacks heal 25% of your total Vitality.

Source Infusions:
1: Grants +2 AP Recovery.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Grants +40% (+4% per Warfare) Lifesteal. Grants Immunity to Ataxia and Subjugated. Recover 1SP.

Target_AMER_Storm_Scourge.Description:
When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, 8 masses of carrion fall onto the [2] radius, preferring to directly strike enemies once each - any remaining strikes occur randomly within the radius. Each strike deals [1] in a [3] radius to enemies.

May be moved once each turn.

Source Infusions:
1: Drop a corpse within 2m of target point, dealing [4] in a [3] radius to enemies.
2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Continue to drop one corpse when carrion is dropped each round. Dropped corpses now deal 2x damage.
3 (requires 9 Necromancer): After casting, as a free ritual reaction, allies within 13m with at least 1 Necromancer try to cast Corpse Explosion on different unexploded corpses within the area of effect. For every two ritual participants, drop an additional corpse.

Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.Description:
Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a [2] radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing [1] Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a [4] radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for [3]). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen.

May be moved once each turn.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): +3 strikes. Strikes now apply up to Terrified II for 2 turns.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Summon an Incarnate at target point and grant it Power, Farsight, Warp, and Shadow Infusions; it does not count against your summon limit. Recover 1SP.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.
Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.DescriptionRef:
Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a [2] radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing [1] Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a [4] radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for [3]). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen.

<font color='858580'  face='Averia Serif'>May be moved once each turn.</font></font>

<font color='46b195'>Source Infusions:</font><font size='17'>
<font color='46b195'>1: </font>+1 turn duration.
<font color='46b195'>2 (requires 5 Summoning): </font>+3 strikes. Strikes now apply up to Terrified II for 2 turns.
<font color='46b195'>3 (requires 9 Summoning): </font>Summon an Incarnate at target point and grant it Power, Farsight, Warp, and Shadow Infusions; it does not count against your summon limit. Recover 1SP.
<font color='858580'  face='Averia Serif'>

Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.BaseDescription:
Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a 5m radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing 45%  Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a 1m radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for (50 Qualifier) Vitality). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen.

Target_AMER_Acclimate.Description:
Target a surface in range, and apply the corresponding skin to yourself for 2 turns, which grants immunity to some statuses, +40% resistance to at least one element, +4 to the corresponding elemental school, and causes you to bleed surfaces.
Water/Ice: Brittle immune, resist Water, +4 Hydrosophist, bleed ice.
Fire: Scorched immune, resist Fire, +4 Pyrokinetic, bleed fire.
Electrified: Charged immune, resist Air, +4 Aerotheurge, bleed electrified water.
Oil/Poison: Calcifying/Poisoned immune, resist Earth/Poison, +4 Geomancer, bleed poison.

Source Infusions:
1: Grants +10% (+3% per Polymorph) resistance of the type chosen. Gain spells corresponding to the type chosen: Deep Freeze, Fire Whip, Closed Circuit, Worm Tremor. These spells do not share cooldowns with their counterparts.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Grants 10% (+1% per Polymorph) maximum resistance of the type chosen. Grants +5 Perseverance. +1 turn duration. Recover 1AP and 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Grants +4 to the corresponding elemental school. Recover 1AP and 1SP.

Target_AMER_Cryotherapy.Description:
Apply Brittle to enemies within target [2] radius, and create 2m ice surfaces beneath them. Then allies in this radius consume frozen surfaces within 2m of themselves, restoring up to [1], based on the size of the surface consumed, and removing 2 stacks of Harried.
Cleanses Scorched, Vulnerable, and Marked.

Source Infusions:
1: Allies are granted +5% to Elemental Resistances (+1% per Hydrosophist), and Immunity to Brittle for 2 turns.
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply again to all characters within 13m.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Allies are granted +2% to Elemental Resistances per Hydrosophist. Recover 1SP.

Apply up to Slowed III to enemies within target [2] radius, and create 2m oil surfaces beneath them. Then allies in this radius consume oil surfaces within 2m of themselves, restoring up to [1], based on the size of the surface consumed, and removing 2 stacks of Battered.
Cleanses Slowed and Swarmed.

Slowed III consumes 7 Harried:
Target has reduced movement and AP recovery.

Shout_Derpy_AssassinInstinct.Description:
Apply Assassin's Instinct to yourself for 3 turns, gaining +30% Accuracy, and during Scoundrel skill casts you also throw a dagger at the first target hit, dealing [1], applying Bleeding for 2 turns, chaining to another enemy in a 5m radius, and deducting 1 AP from you.
After throwing 3 daggers, Assassin's Instinct is removed and you sneak as well as become invisible until the end of your turn.

Source Infusions:
1: Also throw a dagger at every visible enemy within 5m.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Daggers do not deduct AP anymore, have 34% more base damage, and chain twice in a 8m radius. Assassin's Instinct is not removed anymore.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): +1 turn duration. Scoundrel skills now throw a dagger at every enemy hit during the cast. Daggers also apply Hemorrhage for 2 turns and Ruptured Tendons for 1 turn. Recover 2AP and 1SP.

Shout_Derpy_AcidicToxins.Description:
Apply Acidic Toxins to yourself, gaining +30% Poison resistance, and converting the Poison damage you inflict into Physical with a 10% damage bonus. Additionally, attempting to apply Poisoned will convert it into 2 turns of Acid. Caster and undead allies are excluded from this skill's outgoing effects.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 Acidic Toxins turn duration. Applying Acid also applies Calcifying for 2 turns.
2 (requires 5 Geomancer): While applying Calcifying, you have a 30% (+1% per Geomancer) chance to also apply Corroding for 1 turn.
3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Corroding chance is increased to 50% (+2% per Geomancer).
